meanings.definition: A curved shape resembling a segment of a ring.
meanings.sent1: The necklace had shiny crescents hanging from it.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a beautiful picture of crescents in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten chased after the crescents of light on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed crescents as she looked up at the rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The crescents of sand dunes in the desert glowed in the sunset.

meanings.definition: The curved shape of the waxing or waning moon.
meanings.sent1: At night, the sky was filled with bright crescents shining down.
meanings.sent2: I love to gaze at the crescents in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The cookies on the plate were arranged in the shape of crescents.
meanings.sent4: The boat sailed under a sky full of crescents, guiding its way.
meanings.sent5: The crescents of light peeked through the branches of the trees.

meanings.definition: A pastry in the shape of a crescent.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a warm crescent with her morning coffee.
meanings.sent2: The bakery displayed freshly baked crescents in the window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a crescent from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of crescents filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden crescents were the highlight of the dessert table.
